author: qizhou
content: Hi guys.  I am proposing EIP-5027: Remove the limit on contract code size.  I understand that this is rather controversial topic in history (see https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/removing-or-increasing-the-contract-size-limit/3045) but I feel the demand is much stronger than 3 years ago, and the technical side is ready (as we have implemented one and run on our Ethereum-sidechain testnet).  Happy to receive comments and suggestions!  https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5027/files

author: timbeiko
content: So, we've paused adding new EIPs for the next fork for now. If you do want to get some feedback from devs on the ACD calls, you are welcome to join and if we have time, we will cover it. If you don't see this as an urgent change, I'd recommend waiting a few more weeks until coming on as we'll hopefully be a bit less busy with merge work ðŸ˜…

author: samwilsn
content: So basically stick it on an ACD agenda to get some feedback?

author: timbeiko
content: yep, but expect that the next call or two may not have the time to cover it

author: qizhou
content: Sure!  I would like to join the ACD calls.  BTW: what is the full name of ACD and where to find the time/link?  Thank!

author: qizhou
content: And many thanks for Sam's introduction!

author: timbeiko
content:
AllCoreDevs, and the agendas are available here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/518 

Next one is next Friday 14:00 UTC, and we post the zoom link right before the calls in <#745077610685661265>
